body_html: What if you use metagraph to load/save models? I expect Saver approach to break on TensorFlow version changes because layer implementations can change, and that changes names of nodes in the graph
body_text: What if you use metagraph to load/save models? I expect Saver approach to break on TensorFlow version changes because layer implementations can change, and that changes names of nodes in the graph
body: What if you use metagraph to load/save models? I expect `Saver` approach to break on TensorFlow version changes because layer implementations can change, and that changes names of nodes in the graph
